Because the author said so, the author is basically the God of the Manga's universe, it is he that made the MC both a pussy and retarded, listen, if you're not satisfied with the story, you can either imagine your version in your head, or plan an assassination/manipulation towards the author.

This is really one of those hentais were the plot just goes too far in my opinion at the start I mean. Setting is that she's raped and blackmailed by the old ugly teacher until she becomes his cockslave, she still from my understanding wants to get away from him and be with the boy she loves, however the ugly teacher goes to kidnap him and then rapes her / has sex with her infront of him and pretty much say's it's okey to date but your my onahole first which in turn makes her bf leave her so she's alone and open for abuse and brainwashing by the ugly bastered. Then as if thats not enough he goes even a step further and starts sending pictures/videos of raping her to her father, and probably tells her about it as well so now she don't have her lover or her family to help her any more and she's all alone to be raped by the ugly teacher. I mean auhor-san we get it no one will do anything even though he would go to jail 10x over in pretty much any country by doing even a shred of it all.
